Anubis/Hades/Nemesis Enforcer/Serpentor/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Scavenger:


Nemesis Enforcer sidestepped, half of his body being hit by the paralyzing 
beam.  Hitting the ground, he fired off a blast from his optic sensors at 
Dinobot's right foot.

---

Anubis approached from behind, leaping and slashing down with his free hand, 
his 6 in metal claws outstretched, heading for Dinobot's back.

---

Hades crawled along the ground, raising his laser rifle and firing three 
bolts at Dinobot's back.

---

Serpentor smashed through a tree, his optics dimming as he hit the ground.

---

Shuko fell back a few feet, firing off a rocket between Snow Tech and Shadow 
Cat.

---

Scavenger, in his HUMVEE mode, "tearing" up the terrain, swerved to the left, 
stopping, seeing Nemesis under attack.  <Dark One, send the other 
Oblitercons.  Zardus is here as well>  Firing twenty shells off at Dinobot, 
though 10 will miss, unless Dinobot would be stupid enough to jump in front 
of the shells.  <Zardus, it's Scavenger, Nemesis is getting whooped on by 
some weird looking reptillian>
